properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 30 DEC BY
   M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 26-24S 043-32W, 26-24S 043-40W,
      26-24S 043-48W, 27-04S 043-59W,
      27-07S 043-55W, 27-13S 043-52W,
      27-17S 043-48W, 27-17S 043-41W.
   B. 27-51S 045-05W, 27-50S 044-56W,
      27-50S 044-49W, 27-50S 044-41W,
      27-50S 044-33W, 27-51S 044-26W,
      27-53S 044-20W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 31 DEC 17.
